title: PlayStation State of Play Incoming - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.06.19
description:
Get $30 off 23andMe’s Health + Ancestry Kit at http://23andme.com/games

Get started for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Andrea and Greg talk about Thursday's upcoming State of Play from PlayStation.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:25 - Housekeeping
Wednesday after KFAF, KF Update Town Hall Bonanza!
Thank you for supporting Andre Lima Aroo -- he’s working with the Moon Director Duncan Jones and won in a landslide!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Tom Bock, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:00 - PlayStation State of Play Thursday (May 9th)
00:10:37 - Fortnite Stumbles, Makes Good, Tamoor @ GameSpot
00:17:43 - BREAKING NEWS:Ghost Recon news coming 05/09
00:18:18 - Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order at E3, Vince on Twitter
00:18:56 - COD at E3, E3 Twitter
00:22:08 - Claptrap Kerfuffle, Eddite @ GameSpot
00:34:26 - Detective Pikachu Loot comes to Pokemon Go, Tom Meyer @ Twinfinite
00:36:15 - Out today
00:37:05 -  HIMS
00:39:00 - 23&Me
Reader mail   -
00:39:45 - I need some suggestions for games that are fun to play in small sessions (15-20 min). - Geekopia
00:42:48 - Do you have any sort of special plan for your 100th platinum? Like a particular game you want to hold that #100 spot, or potentially streaming you popping that last trophy? - The 5 Star Man
00:45:28 - Since this year marks the end of the 2010s, I was wondering if Kinda Funny or What's Good Games had any plans to do a retrospective on the best games of the decade. - Ron
00:49:40 - Squad Up: The Nano Biologist ON BEHALF OF KINDADC (IRL) - KindaDC and DaNanoBiologist on Twitter
00:50:49 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:Greg and Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
